Notify the media scanner when a file has been downloaded. This will help ensure the file will be picked up by gallery and music applications.

When this setting is disabled, filenames are limited to alphanumeric characters, underscores and hyphens. When enabled, filenames are not restricted. This adds support for non-Latin characters and languages, emoji etc. WARNING: This may cause some files to not save, or may break applications that do not support these characters.
Force a shared item to save even if it does not have explicit support. WARNING: Saving with this feature enabled may have adverse effects.
